name: Tin(IV) bromide
desc: Tin(IV) bromide is the chemical compound SnBr4. It is a colourless low melting solid. SnBr4 can be prepared by reaction of the elements at normal temperatures:
Other names: tin tetrabromide, stannic bromide, bromostannic acid
